comments: a(n-1) = sum_{k=0..ceiling((n-1)/2)} P(7;n-1-k,k), n>=1, with a(-1)=6. These are the SW-NE diagonals in P(7;n,k), the (7,1) Pascal triangle A093564. Observation by _Paul Barry_, Apr 29 2004. Proof via recursion relations and comparison of inputs.Pisano period lengths: 1, 3, 8, 6, 20, 24, 16, 12, 24, 60, 10, 24, 28, 48, 40, 24, 36, 24, 18, 60, ... (perhaps the same as A001175). - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2012

maple: with(combinat):  P:=proc(q) local n; for n from 0 to q doprint(7*fibonacci(n)+fibonacci(n-1)); od; end: P(10^2); # _Paolo P. Lava_, May 18 2015
